articles.description: Nations League reaction as Wales beat Montenegro in Craig Bellamy's first win as manager plus Martin Odegaard limps off for Norway.
articles.title: Nations League: Reaction as Wales played Montenegro & build-up to England v Finland

articles.description: Adrian Newey says he has joined Aston Martin to help lead them to the Formula 1 world championship.
articles.title: Adrian Newey: Aston Martin confirm signing of Formula 1 designer

articles.description: Moses Swaibu was one of the brightest prospects in Crystal Palace's youth ranks, but he ended up in a shady world of cash, danger and fixing rather than football's limelight.
articles.title: Moses Swaibu: Match-fixer from Crystal Palace youth team star

articles.description: Captain Harry Kane will become just the 10th man to make 100 England appearances when the Three Lions face Finland in the Nations League at Wembley on Tuesday.
articles.title: Harry Kane: England striker set to make 100th international appearance

articles.description: Former Ipswich Town and Scotland player and manager George Burley is undergoing cancer treatment.
articles.title: George Burley: Ipswich legend and former Scotland manager having cancer treatment

articles.description: In the build-up to the US Open, eventual men's champion Jannik Sinner was cleared of fault or negligence over two failed doping tests. Yet questions remain over the case.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Does doping case leave cloud hanging over US Open victory?

articles.description: Referee Chris Kavanagh was right to send Declan Rice off in Arsenal's draw with Brighton, the Key Match Incidents panel rules.
articles.title: Arsenal: Declan Rice red card was correct, KMI panel rules

articles.description: Aaron Rodgers' return from injury ends in defeat as the San Francisco 49ers beat the New York Jets 32-19 in the NFL at Levi's Stadium in California.
articles.title: NFL: Aaron Rodgers returns from injury but San Francisco 49ers defeat New YorkJets

articles.description: Europe will face a "hostile" home crowd "absolutely desperate" for the United States to win back the Solheim Cup in Virginia this week, says former captain Mickey Walker.
articles.title: Solheim Cup 2024: Europe warned to expect 'hostile' atmosphere in US

articles.description: Will the title will go down to the wire, and what are upgrades? BBC F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions before the Azerbaijan Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Verstappen, upgrades & Norris - Andrew Benson answers your questions
